intent_atoms.description: Remove or relocate large log files (>1MB) from the repository to prevent committing them.
Large log files must be deleted if not needed, moved to a local-only location, or added to .gitignore if regenerated frequently.
The check-added-large-files pre-commit hook is temporarily disabled to allow commits to proceed.
Re-enable the swift-build-foundationui pre-push hook after resolving test compilation failures.
The swift-build-foundationui pre-push hook must be re-enabled once test compilation issues are fixed.
Fix incorrect usage of YAMLValidator.validate() in tests and use the correct API methods validateComponent() or validateComponents().
